title: EdO theriyamal
sahitya:
EdO teri- | yaamal pOccu- ||



dE ini | enna shey vEn ||



EdO teri- | yaamal pOccu- ||



dE ... ||







anupallavi







aadi paraapara maagiya |



tillai ponnampalavarai ||



veedi dOrum paNindu miga |



migizhndu nalam pera ||



(EdO)







caraNam







iravum pagalum pavavita |



iTar sheyyum aimporiyaal ||



aravin vaay shiru tErai pOl |



andO manam non dEn ||



parivuDan gOpaala krushNan |



paaDi vaNangum kunjita ||



tiruvaDiyai darishanam sheydu |



teLindu manam urugiDa ||



(EdO)
